There are two snaps in the back so you can make them fit different size necks for when your baby grows. They are extremely soft, too and really absorbent. author: Michael Woodburn
text: I had seen these adorable Copper Pearl bandana bibs on Amazon several months ago and I put them in my cart but just never purchased them... I think because it can be really tough to discern online the quailty you're getting and I just didn't want to spend the money and then be dissapointed. Well a few days ago, I was actually presented with the opportunity to try these bibs free of charge in exchange for my honest, unbiased review and I am so glad I did. I am in love with these bibs. My son is an extreme drooler and I was constantly having to change his outfit so he wasn't wearing a wet shirt, these bibs fixed that problem. They are super soft and very absorbent. They are so adorable and stylish to boot. I love this particular set because it has the cute bandana style but in the solid colors so it won't compete with your child's outfit. I have tried a couple other brands of bibs like these and the quality of Copper Pearl bibs is far superior. You can tell by the way they feel and how well they soak up the wetness. I would definitely recommend these bibs to anyone looking for stylish high quality bibs. I know I am eager to try out some of the other super cute prints for my little dude!
title: Amazing bibs

The best part of all is that he looks really stylish and the match a lot of his outfits. I would purchase again, just wish the price was about $5 cheaper.

author: Amazon Customer
text: We have a 6 month old baby boy who drools ALL THE TIME.  His clothes are constantly wet and we have used regular bibs to help keep his clothes dry.  I LOVE these bandanas.  First of all they are really cute, I don't love putting a regular bib on over his outfit because it doesn't look very good, these however are darling.  I like how there are multiple color options in a set, and they have an adorable fit.  So onto the fit.  There are two snaps on the back which is really great to make sure that you get a snug fit, so much better than a  traditional bib. The fabric used is awesome, it is so soft.  Before I felt the fabric I was concerned about it being so close to my baby's skin especailly when it's wet.  As we felt the fabric though I am really happy with it, it's SO soft. Doesn't irritate by little guys skin at all.  If you have a baby that is like a leaky faucet, I highly recommend these drool bibs!!! I received this product free of charge for my honest, unbiased review.
title: best drool bib ever

author: Kristi Parkes
text: So so soft, cute & practical!  I have a 15 month old little boy whom I LOVE to put in cute outfits, and hate covering them up with ugly bibs.  This bib is so cute and soft.  It was so helpful when we used it at church while he enjoyed some snacks and I didn't have to worry about his nice Christmas Sunday shirt getting ruined.  It's easy to put on and take off!  My little boy loves it too!  I love all the colors in this set!  I was so grateful that I received this product free of charge in exchange for my honest, unbiased review.  Even though I received it for free it's worth every penny at full price!  I will be ordering some for my next baby for sure!!
title: Soft, cute & practical!!!

author: mpayne
text: Loved the soft and durable fabric and the two neck-size options. I got these from a friend and love them! The fasteners are little snaps too so my baby couldn't yank it off. Super comfy for the drool-maker and it never soaked through to get the clothes that my kiddo was wearing wet.  I hate the funny drool-dried-on-drool-smell and this gives me an easy way to keep him smelling nice.
title: Less work for mama and a dry-shirt little fella!

author: Amazon Customer
text: My baby is constantly covered in slimy drool all over his chin and neck. Usually I clean it off with a burp cloth but they are never within reach when I need one. These bibdanas are perfect for catching and wiping up the constant drool! Not only are they cute and fashion-forward, they are incredibly soft and absorbent. I wish all my baby's clothes could be made from the same material! They are very well-made -- the fabric around the neck is folded down with the seam lower down so that the sewn edge doesn't run against baby's neck (though even the seam is super soft) and to create a better "seal" around the neck. I received this product free of charge in exchange for my honest, unbiased review.
title: As soft as they are cute!

author: aeanderson
text: We have about 20 drool bibs (and have to wash them every day) because my son drools more than any baby I've ever seen, and these are my favorite. We bought them just before he turned three months to help keep his clothing dry, and they weren't as big on him as some of the others we own. Now at 7 months old the others don't look big on him anymore, but these still fit well thanks to the extra set of snaps. It's hard to find ones without patterns, but these solid color ones go with everything and I usually save them for him to wear when we are going out somewhere because they look the nicest. The only thing I'd say is that the photo makes the colors appear a little brighter than they are in person. When I received them the colors were slightly more faded than I expected, but ultimately I didn't mind.
title: The best drool bibs we own

author: Dan
text: I bought these a few months ago, and loved them. They absorbed my baby's drool and kept him dry, fit well and were super cute. I bought more bandanas from another company and they were bigger, too much material for my guy, and kept bunching up into his mouth. So I re-bought these, expecting the perfect fit again, but the second time around they were just as big as the other brand! See attached pic that shows the smaller original bandanas on top of the newer set (minus dark blue one in the wash). I was sad. So, I think these are average, 3 stars, since I loved one set and didn't like the other.
title: Loved one set, bought again, didn't love the other.

author: Beastiephile
text: I've ordered 5 sets of these bibs now. I was looking for something a little more stylish than the standard bib while still being functional. I also wanted something that wouldn't lay flat against my son's chest and cause the dreaded drool rash, and these really do help. The bandana style bibs do rest up against the chin though, so we still see a bit of rash and irritation there but overall it's an improvement from using traditional bibs.
title: High quality and stylish

author: mixedballerina
text: Love these! I found these when looking to create a 'daycare uniform' for my four month old (when your husband is going to be dressing your kid each morning, best to take the guess work out of it).  By building a uniform of different solid colored pants (thanks primary.com!) that will be paired daily with the oh-so-economical short sleeve or long sleeved white onesie, I loved that these bibs can jazz up this baby uniform with different colors and patterns.  Once I received this first set in the mail and discovered how soft they are, yet also how absorbent and fashionable, I immediately bought three other Copper Pearl sets! They wash well (though may benefit from a light iron after), protect baby's clothes and are just super cute!
title: I can't wait to buy more colors!

I bought these along with another brand, KiddyStar, and after three washes, kiddystar held up a little better then copper pearl and also kiddystar is a little bigger too .which is why I gave them 3 stars, price, size and after wash.

author: Stephen Chapman
text: These bibs are the best, it's the only kind our kid wears. Our baby has reflux so he spits up a lot and he's been wearing these since he was only a couple of weeks old. They're soft, they don't soak through to his clothes, they fit great, and they look awesome. I'm not into the super goofy ass baby clothes that most parents dress their poor kids in, so these bibs are right in my wheel house. The designs are cool and the colors go well with any of his outfits. We get so many compliments, especially from the ladies at daycare. If your kid spits up on it just make sure you wash it asap or lay it out to dry, otherwise they get mold spots. But these bibs are super affordable so it's not a big deal to get another pack.
title: A++

author: Krayfield
text: I absolutely love any bandanna drool bib! They are cute and stylish wall extremely effective in catching all spit up and to drool from baby. I now get to keep my baby in the same outfit all day and just replace the bbib when it gets completely soaked. My son has acid reflux and is spitting up all day long and so this saves his outfits. And instead of being a babyish bib I now get to keep him looking cute and fly instead of like a normal baby. These are extremely wide and I believe these will take him from being a newborn into being a toddler they are great quality and I wash them all the time I would recommend them and I give them as gifts to every new mom I know
title: Perfectly adorable bib!!!

author: Nico
text: I am a repeat customer and have now 16 of these. Our son loves to over eat and spit up a lot. These are made of very absorbent fabric but thick enough to prevent soaking through onto the shirt. They are stylish and look part of the outfit :) The 2 snap system allows to adjust the neck size as baby grows. So they convert very easily from Baby 0-12 to toddler.
title: Super efficient, stylish, absorbent, and size adjustable!

author: Amazon Customer
text: This is our second set of Bandana bibs from Copper Pearl (we were gifted the first set we received) & we LOVE them for everyday drool coverage! The backing on the bibs is incredibly soft, so I never worry about it rubbing or irritating my son's skin, & the cut/shape of the bibs is perfect because it doesn't bunch up at the neck or under his chin. I also appreciate the snap fasteners, since I know the bib is secure (& there's no velcro to potentially catch on things or irritate the back of my son's neck). We've machine washed & dried our bibs a handful of times so far & have had no issues with shrinkage or wear. These are such a nice alternative to standard bibs, since they're stylish but also super-functional (the bandana shape also helps with the bib not bunching up underneath car seat straps). We'll definitely order more when we wear these out!
title: Awesome, high-quality product!

author: Megan
text: Love these, way better than regular bibs. Love that they are snaps instead of Velcro. They don't get in baby's way as much as he tries to get his hands in his mouth. Pretty absorbent, sometimes go through 2 a day, three on a bad drool day. Have held up well through multiple washes. The wash instructions say to line dry but I've had a couple end up in the dryer on accident and haven't had any problems. Would recommend over any

They are the perfect baby accesory, and even when the outfit is more basic they really jazz up the look. I've found these are perfect for the baby that is a drooler, and is also great for church or special occasions that involve wearing nicer clothes that you want to keep drool and food stain free. Because in my years of doing laundry, the collar tends to be where the biggest stains occur on infant clothing. These bibs are a must!

author: Brandon Miller
text: We absolutely LOVE copper pearl and all their products!! These 5 in 1 covers are the absolute best though!! It keeps unwanted germy hands off our baby when we are out and about and keeps him asleep if we are out as well! It's also the best nursing cover because it covers you ALL the way around. So when I forgot to wear a nursing friendly shirt and have to pull my shirt all the way up the people behind me don't get a peak! Haha It's also great, now my baby is older, to put over the grocery cart and high chairs. Those things are nasty and i don't think a sanitizing wipe is going to do that much good!! Plus you can wear it as a scarf so when your nursing you don't have to take it off or worry about leaving it at home! This is the gift I get all my expecting mommy friends and highly recommend it to anyone!!

author: Erika
text: This car seat cover is a total show stopper! Floral patterns are so "in" right now and i love that this pattern is simple yet trendy...some other floral patterns out there are a little too busy for my liking. This one is perfect for my new baby girl! I have another pink stripe car seat cover/nursing cover from Copper Pearl that I LOVE so I was excited to get this floral cover in exchange for my honest review. Whenever I'm out and about with these covers I always get compliments about how convenient the design is. I love that it keeps peering eyes and hands out and doesn't flip or shift when there's a gust of wind or it gets bumped (other curtain-style car seat covers totally have that problem). Another thing I love is that it's so easy to peer in from the top down - makes it so much more convenient when my car seat is on my stroller, or when I've set on the ground. I'm not always having to bend over just to peek in at my baby. As a nursing cover, I love that it gives full 360 coverage so you don't have to worry about your back being exposed when you're out in public nursing... again, something that other curtain-style covers can't offer. This is for sure one of favorite items as a new mom and would recommend it for yourself or as a gift for someone else!
title: One of my favorite baby items!

text: The pattern is even more beautiful in person!! I can't wait to buy the matching crib sheet!!!
title: Great quality, beautiful product!

author: Amazon Customer
text: Loved it!
title: Five Stars

author: militarywifemommylife
text: I have never bought a carseat cover with my other kids, but this being my first winter baby I wanted something to shield my newborn from curious lookers during cold and flu season. I didn't want something heavy as winter in my area is mostly mild. I wanted something I could still use in the humid summer. I also wasn't willing to spend more than $30. This fit my price range and I love the print. Very girly and cute. I've gotten many compliments on the print alone. The material is lightweight but not see through. Very easy to stretch around my Graco Snugride 40 carseat and holds its shape perfectly. I personally don't use a nursing cover but I have tried it on and it would work perfect as a nursing cover if I were to need/want one. I wear an XL in tops and given the stretchy nature of the fabric think it would work for someone bigger than me. Overall I'm 100% pleased with this.
title: Perfect for my purpose

author: Matt C.
text: I bought 2 of these covers for my twins. Loved the fabric but my babies are only 2 months old and we haven't even used them very much and all of the stitching is totally falling apart and I'm guessing won't last much longer. Super sad and disappointed. Especially at the price you think that they would be good quality.
title: Falling apart after 1 month

author: JVancer
text: This floral fabric is so cute and soft, I wish it were available in a skirt for ME. Luckily, it's one of those designs that I'm drawn to and love seeing every day around my baby girl's carseat. The great thing about this product is that it's not just for a carseat--you can use it as a nursing cover or a shopping cart cover, too. I've used it as a blanket and a burp cloth in a pinch, as well. It's lightweight, stretchy, and breathable. When you're toting around a huge diaper bag and carseat, you've got to have things that pull double duty. Luckily, this one does triple duty.
title: Triple Duty Cover

author: Brett & Lauren
text: Copper Pearl did it again! Just when i think Copper Pearl stuff couldn't get any cuter, they come out with this gem! I'm obsessed with this beautiful floral pattern, its exactly what i've been looking for! The versatility of this cover is what keeps me coming back for more. This cover is so comfortable as a nursing cover and i use it all the time. I didn't know how much i would use it as a car seat cover but boy was i wrong, i use it pretty much every where we go. I love that the stretchy material fits so well around the car seat and blocks my little one from the sun and especially the wind!
title: Just when i think Copper Pearl stuff couldn't get any cuter!!!

author: Lindsey Cragun
text: After 3 babies I have used several different nursing covers and car seat covers and this my favorite! I love the lightweight stretchy fabric, the full coverage, and the darling design. I have had several people ask me where I got my cover and I am happy to recommend Copper Pearl! I was given this product for free but all opinions are my own.
title: My favorite cover!

author: FleaBag01
text: I'm a mom of 2 little girls.  With my 1st little one I used an Aden & Anais muslin blanket to cover her infant carrier; seemed to work fine.  Purchased this Copper Pearl after recommendations from my favorite local boutique and Amazon reviews.  It is stretchy and super soft.  Easy to peak inside from handle area or left from the bottom.  It stays in place, won't blow up in the wind.  Couldn't be happier with the print, it is so girly and cute!!!  I researched other infant covers and other reviewers raved about this one, and now I know why.  I'm hard to impress and I'm impressed!
title: Didn't expect to LOVE it this much!  Great infant seat cover!!!

author: Carrie
text: This is by far the best nursing cover! It's so soft and like a stretch t-shirt, but thick nice quality.  The print is really cute and the white material is not see-through at all.  It hangs down well below my hips so that it provides excellent coverage.  I love that you can pull the entire thing over you and it covers your back and front completely.  The neck is really stretchy so that you can look down at the baby or pull an arm through, but it doesn't wear out - it just bounces back in place.  Washed many times and held up really well.
title: Love, Love, Love!

author: Chris Hahn
text: My kiddo is almost 9 months old and I use this EVERY SINGLE DAY! This product is my favorite and it’s so versitile!! I loved the light fabric while using it as a nursing cover and as a new mom I loved that it went around me so even if she tried to flash people, which she did, she couldn’t! I use this as a car seat cover for when she’s asleep, it’s too sunny, it’s raining (to house from car) or there’s too many people wanting to touch her I just put it around her and give her privacy. Also, when grocery shopping, it’s awesome. It kinda acts like a catch-it-all bib and I’ll throw some toys for her to keep busy and NOT put her mouth on the cart! Even while traveling I used it as a blanket for her since it doubled as a nursing cover. I followed CopperPearl on instagram and fell in LOVE with this pattern as it fit perfectly for my flower girl. Thank you for making motherhood a little easier!!
title: Best thing since sliced bread.

author: Just Jane
text: I've used this item for nearly two months so far. I never had a car seat cover for my son and questioned the need for one as his car seat had a large canopy. My baby girl, however, seems to love being enclosed completely. She sleeps almost every time she's put under the cover. I like the fact that I can take her out grocery shopping, for walks, to church and she is protected from casual contact during peak infectious disease seasons.
title: seems to love being enclosed completely

author: Dorothy
text: As a new mom, everything is a transition for me.  Learning how to breastfeed, and becoming more comfortable with breastfeeding in public, because that is where baby needs to eat.  This cover is perfect!  It is lightweight, but covering!  I use this to breastfeed, as well as a carseat cover, and even a swaddle if needed.  The pattern on the cover is lovely too!  I love the big roses.  As a carseat cover, it is not very thick, does not block out much of the light, which makes it not quite as helpful, but it does block out distractions.  I Love this cover, and am looking into purchasing others.
title: SO useful!

author: J.D.Allen
text: This is SO soft that I end up using it as a blanket for my newborn most of the time. I love that it is lightweight and can cover the car seat easily when we go places. I have also used it as a nursing cover, and really like that it provides coverage 360 degrees around me. It works really well when I have a shirt on that I need to lift up! This is definitely one of those products I keep in my diaper bag everyday.

Not only does it keep my newborn protected when we are in public, but it also acts as a sun shield when we drive in the car! I can't tell you how much I love it!

author: Sayward Sue
text: My baby is due in July, so I'll have to report back once this product is in actual use, but so far I'm excited about it. The cover is soft, breathable, has an impressive amount of stretch, and is very comfortable to wear - I feel like I have incredible privacy while it's on, especially regarding my sides and back, much moreso than the "apron" style nursing covers I've tried on. It's also easy to look down into the neck hole and maneuver underneath it. Even if I or my baby don't like using this for nursing, it's still incredibly versatile and will not be a wasted investment to me. I'm eager to use this as a cover for shopping carts, my car seat, stroller, restaurant high chairs, etc. The idea of owning a separate nursing cover, bulky shopping cart cover, and a canopy style car seat cover that can blow around did not appeal to me, and this folds up SMALL. I've shown the cover to a few veteran moms and they were all very excited about it and wished they had had one. One thing to note is that the Covered Goods version of this product shows the model also wearing it as a scarf. I could not comfortably wrap this around my neck twice to wear that way, but that is not important to me.
title: Incredibly Versatile

author: G.N.
text: I love this so much better than the apron-style cover. It provides way better coverage for this newbie mom, and still provides coverage when the baby shifts around, pulls off, or wiggles while nursing. I flip it up after nursing to use as a burp cloth sometimes, and it looks great when I'm still wearing it while baby is taking a quick nursing break. I like that it's lightweight, so packs up super small in my diaper bag, doesn't make the baby hot during the summer (so that he'll actually stay under there and not try to expose me). I've also used it to tuck on the outside of my mesh carrier when wearing the baby, just to provide a little layering on not-hot days. Love this and highly recommend. I'm a size medium currently, and there is plenty of extra room underneath. The neckhole is give perfect size--allows me to peek at the baby without exposing me on top.
title: Fantastic

author: Andrea L.
text: I ordered this 3-in-one nursing cover for my twins.  I received one for a shower gift, but decided I could use a second so I had one for each carseat.  This cover is easy to wash and can be thrown in the washer and dryer with other laundry.  I would be careful to keep it separate from velcro (bibs, swaddle blankets, etc) Because the fabric is so soft and stretchy, I worry that the velcro would snag the fabric of the nursing cover.  I like this Copper Pearl cover as much as I do my Covered Goods nursing cover. I would say it is like a 10-in-1 because I also use it as a swaddle blanket and burp rag when we are out and about.  With twins, i need to only carry the essentials that are very versatile.  I would highly recommend this cover and plan to gift one to my cousin who is expecting her first child soon!

text: Truly so versatile. I love that I can keep nasty winter germs (and over-eager strangers) out of my little one's face. You don't have to worry about the wind whipping it up when used as a car seat canopy (or as a nursing cover for that matter ;) ). I was concerned the nursing cover part would be a pain, but it actually hangs nicely in such a way that I can see my baby without anyone seeing me. I haven't tried it as a cart cover yet because he is too little, but I love that I can throw it in the wash if it gets dirty, without it becoming wrinkled or looking disheveled afterward.

author: Amazon Customer
text: I have been using a typical nursing cover for 6 months and was fine with it. But then I was given this cover to try out and review and I couldn't believe how much I loved it the first time I used it! I had to feed my baby at a restaurant and felt totally covered and wasn't worried about his little flailing arm lifting up the cover and flashing people. I love how it covers you all around, and it's light weight. The material is super stretchy which makes it easy to cover you and your baby. It also worked well as a car seat cover when my husband took our baby for a run outside. It didn't fly around in the wind, just stayed tight on there. I'm super happy with it!
title: Great nursing cover that COVERS!

author: Ric Heaton
text: This cover is the exact thing I have been looking for. I have had the normal covers that blow in the wind or slide off the handles and the nursing covers that have the annoying rim that you have to peek through and doesn't cover your back. I'm so excited for this product! I am having my 3rd baby in June and with it being so hot in the summer the traditional car seat covers and nursing covers are just not what I'm looking for anymore. I am really so stoked that I have found this multi use product. The quality is great and the material is strong. I would highly recommend getting one of these. I am a doula and will be suggesting it to alllll of my clients!

author: Auriel
text: This cover is amazing! I received a few different covers as gifts and none of them compare to this one. I love the stretchy material and design of the cover that slips easily over the car seat. I love have it close by so I can take it off the seat then put it on myself when I am ready to nurse my son. The shape of the cover helps me to be discreet when I'm breast feeding in public but the lightness of the fabric is comfortable so my son doesn't sweat or get uncomfortable. In fact I went to my brothers hockey game last night and arrived with the cover over the car seat so my newborn son was protected from the crowd of people. Then, mid game I was able to feed my son using this cover over me! It was awesome!  *I received this product free of charge in exchange for my honest, unbiased review. Thank you Copper Pearl for this amazing cover!
title: Fabulous and Convenient!

author: Scott
text: I was SO excited to recieve this multi use car seat cover!  I recieved this free of charge to give my unbiased review so i couldn't wait to try it and actually see if the 3 in 1 uses were pratical. First off I love love love the carseat cover! I live where the wind blows quite a bit and my newborn is almost 2 weeks old.  I had to take him for a few Dr. appointments and I loved that the cover wasn't flying off in the wind because my hands were full with baby on one arm and my toddler in the other! I've also had the chance to use the cover for not only nursing but it's been nice to throw over me to pump as well as family pops in and out to visit. The material is soft and stretchy so it's comfy for my little guy and it's light and comfortable for me so I'm not dying of heat with a cover on me while nursing! I haven't had a chance to use the shopping cart cover but with how happy I am with the carseat and nursing function- I'm sure I won't be let down ! Great product!!
title: First off I love love love the carseat cover

author: Amazon Customer
text: I knew after my 1st child that I needed a new cover. When I found out I was pregnant with my 2nd, I was searching everywhere for the perfect cover. And I found it in this product! There are so many pros to this product:
title: Love this item! Wish I had for my first!

author: Kaysom K
text: We are expecting our third babe in June and this time around I was desperate to find not only a good hassle free car seat cover but also a great nursing cover! After the owner Stephanie heard about my search she offered to let me try out her awesome product! I have seen other brands selling the same type covers for double the price and was suprise to find when i tried them out that this one is higher quality! not only does it fit on the car seat perfectly it has been made with the perfect fabric to be able to pull on and off with ease. I have nursed all my kiddos and finding the right cover is always a struggle, they are either too bulky with too much fabric to control, or not enough coverage where you feel like you are exposing yourself constantly.  This cover solves ALL those problems! Not only is the fabric the perfect soft,breathable material it also covers you completely while still allowing your babe to feel like they aren't being smothered..mom as well ;) this cover is a game changer! I also love that I can easily slip it off at the grocery store to keep my babes germ free and be able to slip it back on hassle free unlike other covers I have had in the past! The only thing I wish is I had had this cover with all my babes! No more carrying bulky items for carseats,feeding,and shopping this product is one item that is easily stored and used making space in our diaper bag for more important things like extra snacks!! Love love love my Copper Pearl cover and can't say enough about how much it has made my Mom life easlier! A must for all Moms! Not to mention the adorable patterns they come in! Five stars for sure, and will be gifting these to every new Mom!
title: This cover is a game changer and a MUST HAVE!

author: Kendra Oxendale
text: Let me start by saying that I really love this product...however, the quality just wasn't great.  Within a week of using it there were little holes in the fabric, and then within a month there was a large 8" hole in the cover in the front near where the car seat connects to the base.  Functionally, this is great and I got compliments all the time on it, I just wish the quality was better so it lasted me longer than a month. Bummer!
title: Let me start by saying that I really love this product

author: Megan Fisher
text: I am so in love with this. We just had our baby girl and was so excited to be able to try it out. I love this as a nursing cover. I love that it goes around you front and back, a lot of them are just covering you in the front. It is fitted but not too tight. Perfect for mom to peek at baby while nursing, but I felt plenty covered up.

author: CH
text: My wife ordered this cover thinking it is very cute and it is a very cute cover. But the quality is very poor. The cover we received had holes in the fabric and ripped seams. Also, the fabric is very thin which provided no blockage of sun when placed over the car seat. We ultimately returned it instead of getting a replacement because of the other reviewers that had received poor quality covers. We were most disappointed by their customer service. We purchased the item on their website, not through Amazon because the prices are cheaper on their website. Their website says that they would cover the shipping charges in the event of returning due to a manufacturing defect, but when it came time to return the item, they refused to cover the shipping costs. At least stand by your product and the words on your website.
title: Beware: Cute but poor quality

author: a townsend
text: So this swaddle blanket is big, soft, stretchy, and gorgeous just like all the other CP blankets.  This specific color is a bit of a mess though.  Obviously you want to wash any fabric before baby comes but this sucker is so full of deep red dye that it takes a million washes to get out.  If you don't wash it thoroughly enough it will leave dye on everything it touches.  I had washed this darn blanket like 5 times and I'm praying that's enough.  It doesn't look like the actual blanket has lightened much after washing it so that's good, but I do really wish Copper Pearl would have taken care of this issue prior to shipping it out to consumers.  With how expensive these blankets are you shouldn't have to run the risk of getting dye everywhere.
title: Gorgeous, high quality, but SO MUCH DYE.

author: Buben
text: Blech.  I really don't like these, and wish I hadn't bought them.  The patterns looked cute and modern on-line, but in real life look cheesy and cheap.  Sort of like a grandma's nightgown.  I am giving it as a gift, and the packaging is poor -- the paper label is not attached to the bibs themselves, but is just folded around them.  And the label "Copper Pearl" is about 1" big (large), and is sewn tightly on the front of each bib (I didn't notice it when I was ordering) -- written in a cheesy looking cursive script.  Not sure why it's necessary for the baby who is wearing these to have a big advertisement around her neck.  I'm embarrassed to be giving these to my niece, but since I don't have time to return and order something else, I guess that's what I'll have to do.  The quality of the material seems okay.
title: Disappointed . . . looked much cuter in the pics

author: Matcha T.
text: This is my favorite bandana bib set from Copper Pearl.  It is beautiful for the days you want your little one to sport a more feminine look.  I already own about 20 of these, so I knew exactly what I was getting into: the bibs are beautiful and functional at the same time.  My little one is a heavy drooler, and these bibs have saved us from having to change outfits 3-4 times a day.  We do, however, go through at least 3-4 of these a day because there's only so much it can absorb before it starts to wreak of baby drool and upchuck.  I took off one star only because these are not made of organic cotton.  My baby loves to munch and chew on her bib as she is teething, so it would be great if Copper Pearl had an organic option.  Otherwise, these bibs are perfect.  I wished they made these when my baby boy was an infant.
title: This is my favorite bandana bib set from Copper Pearl

text: If you're shopping for "fine," this is it. I wish I would've zoomed in on the picture more before purchasing. For $20, I'd expect a one-layer blanket to have bound edges. The material is fine, the color is really lovely (as pictured). A two layer version with edges bound in the same material would be fantastic!

text: Seriously the cutest!!! My baby definitely needs these for drool but even if she wasn't a massive drooler, I would buy them anyways. The colors are true to the pictures and the quality is amazing! They look absolutely adorable on, super soft and work so well!  My baby girl was getting really fussy throughout the day because the chest of her outfit would be soaking wet and cold! Now we don't have to change her outfit a few times a day and she is able to stay dry and look super cute in the process! She is constantly getting compliments on them and people are shocked when they find out their bibs for drooling! My only regret is that I wish we could afford to buy more!! I want them in every color and design!!!

I've been hand washing them everynight since in purchased this and it's been a week now and it holds up very well and the milk stains come off easily. There are wrinkles after u hand wash, but that doesn't bother me too much. I lay it flat to dry. I wish I knew about these when I had my other two kids.

author: Kelsey
text: My daughter started drooling at around 2 months and our standard cotton bibs just weren't cutting it. I love that these remain dry on the back so she isn't sitting with a wet shirt and she also looks super cute with the different styles! These will grow with her which is an added bonus. I will continue to buy.
title: Love these!

author: Tina Lou
text: Love the bibs, they are super cute on my daughter. They fit her perfectly at 4 months, but I think they could also fit a younger baby as well, they basically have 3 sizing options with the snaps position. These are the first bandana bibs I've put on her, but I was surprised and delighted at how much she can soak the bib without the back of it being wet. My babe's a total drooler right now and loves putting everything in her mouth, so we put bibs on her all the time to keep her clothes dry and keep the wetness off her sensitive skin. I hated that before I had these bibs, every pic we would take of her, she had a lame bib on, but with these bandanas, not only is she dry but looking adorable. Needless to say I'll be ordering more!
title: Love the bibs

author: Elizabeth Fine
text: This is my favorite brand of bandana bib, and the only one I've ordered a second pack of.  They are soft as can be, and slide under the chin easier than others I've purchased.  My husband will dig through the pile to get one of these, and leave the others unused.  I'm hopeful a new design will be released soon since I already have 2 of each of these!
title: This is my favorite brand of bandana bib

I have to admit that I love admiring how clean they are out of the package because I know that visual won't last that long!!! We travel a lot so to minimize packing, we invested in disposable bibs back at the 3 month mark however my 10 month old has now mastered ripping the bibs off. We are now back to the cloth bibs so purchased these beauties for trip this weekend.

text: I really love these bibs. Super soft and they wash well. My daughter is a pretty heavy drooler and they get soaked pretty quickly. I do recommend thicker material/brands if that's the case for your kiddo. Otherwise I really like them.

I will be ordering more!

author: Nina Dharmasaroja
text: Adorable, functional and stylish for baby. These coordinate well with outfits and becomes a part of the baby's over all look. They are soft too with trendy designs. I wouldn't use these for meal time though. Mostly for drool, or for catching bottle drips. I wouldn't want to stain and ruin them. I use the plastic back bibs for heavier meals. Overall I enjoy how they look on my girl and how sweet it looks.

author: Jenn
text: I love these! I bought them for my twins and not only are they so cute but they are super absorbent. I have two older boys and they never spit up like these girls. It has left me confused on how to keep their cute clothes clean. I was going through multiple traditional bibs a day but these keep them so dry And last all day! I also love that it allows their arms to be free. The regular bibs get crunched up as they move their arms around but the bandana style doesn't. 😍

text: I have a 3 month old granddaughter who dribbles constantly after she's fed. I think it's the nap on the reverse side that does it, plus they are very absorbent.  Whatever, it works! And they are very cute and well designed with an extra lip under the chin and two snaps at the back. Best bib we could find any where.

author: CJ
text: These are so adorable and the actually work. My little drool factory was soaking through so many bibs and outfits before we discovered these! Our Aden and Anais bibs were nice, but they are no match for a teething tot. The front is absorbent and the back is some kind of fleece material that stops the drool from leaking through. These coordinate with and dress up my baby's outfits, she looks too cute in them!
title: Favorite drool bibs

author: Emma
text: These bibs are adorable, and so absorbent! I use them for my 2 month old baby for spit up even though it says it's for drool. The extra snaps make it so that I can adjust it right up to her neck so there is no spit up in her neck. Because she spits up so much, a bib has to be a part of her daily wardrobe! So happy to find something that is cute! They look perfect still after every wash. However, I should add that I haven't dried them yet. I lay them flat to dry. But it doesn't bother me...I just got into the habit of doing it. I bet it would be fine if it got dried in the dryer though I just haven't done it yet. I might try it with one and see how it looks.
title: Great for my 2 month old spit up monster :)

text: This is the fourth time I purchased these bibs! Good for babies who spit-up a lot or drool. The bibs look much cuter than traditional-style bibs. We get many compliments on how cute our baby looks in them. Bought this "girly" pack for a friend who just had a baby. I think this will become my "go-to" baby shower gift.

text: Very cute patterns and super soft. Our twin girls are 7 weeks old and super spitter uppers and this bandana style covers their front and shoulders nicely keeping their clothes dry. The front is soft and absorbent and the back is soft repellent fleece. We love them right now for when they're  in their car seats as the bibs cover their straps and shirts to keep clean and dry. The neck hole closes small enough to keep them in place and has a second snap for when they are bigger and drooling instead!
title: Great purchase!

author: Amazon User
text: I love these bandanas. They are adorable, have a soft lining on the inside, and have two snap sizes. My 7 month old still fits the smallest size, so these will last for quite awhile. I have washed and dried a few times now and they still look new. I have received many compliments on these bibs! I will say that my baby does tend to get hot with these on now that the weather has warmed up so I don't use it for great lengths of time especially if we're outside.
title: I receive many compliments!

author: Lynda
text: These bandana bibs are precious. I've tried a couple of different brands, but these are the favorite, by far. They stay totally dry underneath, and when we need to switch them out because they are wet on top, it only takes a short time for them to dry. This is important for us, because we have a crazy drooler and we have to take a spare bib everywhere we go, so it's important that it's a pretty quick drying time...because by the time she gets the other one soaked, we need the old one to be dry! The patterns are adorable, too!
title: Love these bibs

author: Malissa Irby
text: These bibs are extremely cute and fashionable as well as far softer and of higher quality than most dribble bibs. The bibs close with a snap rather than noisy, scratchy Velcro and, they are adjustable to grow with your little one. The designs and patterns are adorable and subtle - they mix and match with any color/pattern and are a great way to dress up a onesie and keep it safe from the rivers of drool unleashed by baby. Customer service is excellent. Product arrived on time. Very positive experience with this seller.
title: Cute, soft, fashionable and versatile bibs!

author: Beth
text: We received a pack of these bibs as a gift when our daughter was born and I love them so much I had to order some more! They are such good quality and so soft- not to mention incredibly cute and stylish! Favorite bib for my little girl- hands down!
title: Best bibs ever!

author: S. Greer
text: I love these! My friend told me about them a couple weeks ago and then she contacted me on Wednesday with 24hr coupon code they were running. I bought them right away and they came the next day!!! I was pleasantly surprised. They are so soft and absorbent so we're not having any soak through onto my baby's shirt at all! My baby had spit-up some blueberry on it and I was panicking that it would stain so I scrubbed it and layed it out in the sun to dry and it was totally clear! The prints are so cute and they just look darling on her. Highly recommend this product.
title: I love these! My friend told me about them a ...

So far I'm 100% happy with the product. I just hope they stay soft after washing them. I forgot to mention that they have very cute prints.

I'm not sure how big of a company/manufacturer Copper Pearl is, but I like that their product feels like I bought in a little mom-and-pop boutique - made with care, not what you see every baby wearing, and really fills a need.

author: Emily Wean
text: We LOVE these bandana bibs! They're gorgeous, well made and work so well! My daughter is a drool factory and soaked through every other bib we'd tried, these still get soaked but they keep her chest and clothes dry - and they're absolutely adorable! If I could afford to I'd buy them in every pattern they come in!
title: We LOVE these bandana bibs

author: Heather Walsh
text: I bought these thinking that they might pill less than some of the other brands since I didn't see any mention about that in other reviews. After washing them I was disappointed to see that they still pilled just as much. Another thing that I should have noticed before is that they have the surged edge, which looks a little less polished and lower quality than the folded-over edge that some other brands offer. Although the prints are really cute, the pilling, the surged edge, and the thinner bib make me feel like these are 3-star worthy bibs.
title: 3 stars for pilling, surged edge, and thinness

author: Sweet Pea
text: I am absolutely in love with these drool bibs and the Copper Pearl company! These bibs are the perfection combination of style, form and function!  They are super adorable bibs are soft and absorbent, and my baby doesn't mind wearing her bibdanas all day long (each bib will my baby about 4 hours of constant drooling).  They are made in a way so that the fabric lies nice and flat on the baby's chest.  I get compliments on the fashionable patterns all the time, as well.
title: I am absolutely in love with these drool bibs and the Copper Pearl company

author: S. Bowen
text: These things lose their shape super fast, the polyester on the back pills really quick. I know it says you have to iron after each wash, but what mom has time for that? Lame.
title: Not good.

author: LittleSof&Mama
text: Adorable designs, matches almost any outfit! We are always getting compliments when my daughter is rocking these. Except for eating, my 5 1/2 month old aka teething drool monster only wears bandana bibs! I don't recommend feeding your babes food while they are wearing these unless you have quick access to a pre-wash stain removing spray! Keep them looking fresh! However they are a easy wash. This is a great brand, the bibs are super soft for sensitive skin and absorbent. It takes at least 4-6 hours of constant drooling for them to get remotely soaked. 2 Easy adjustable snap buttons keep the babe from pulling it off easily, but keep supervision while they are sleeping in case of strangulation. My daughter has been wearing them since she was 3 months old and is now almost 6 months old, and still using the smaller adjustment. The polka dot one is fading a bit, but that's probably because she wears it a lot! We love this product.
title: Pretty in Pink. And Polka Dots!

The yellow polka dots are more of an ugly brown yellow than the yellow gold they appear to be, and the pink bib is much more pastel peach. This is fine, and won't impact the usefulness, but I would have ordered another set if I knew what they were really going to look like. :(

text: These bibs are wonderful! My daughter had eczema on her neck and her drooling aggregated the condition which is why I bought these. Another wonderful thing about these is that they are so soft and light and do not flip over on top of my daughter's face and stay put.  They hold up wonderfully in the washer/dryer. I had her in these for one day and immediately bought 2 more sets. Great bibs!

text: I received this product free of charge in exchange for my honest, unbiased review. I can't get enough of these bibs. My daughter drools like crazy. Also, the bandana bibs have adjustable snaps so they fit comfortable around the neck and you don't have to worry about your child pulling them off. If that isn't enough they are soft and so cute. Everywhere I go people ask me where I get them. I love these bibs and would recommend them to anyone.

I was hesitant at first because I don't like bibs and hardly ever use them. But these are awesome for my drooling teething baby because they keep her dry and the fit is comfy and doesn't bother her at all. I would definitely recommend these to a friend! They would also be a really cute baby gift!
title: Adorable Bibs!

author: Brie Ahrenholz
text: We love these bibs for our very drooly and spit up queen. They fit her well at 5 months with plenty of room to grow. The company has great customer service. One bib came with a purple mark on it and they immediately sent replacements with their apology. I would buy these again or give as a gift. We get compliments often.

author: Peggy Nelson
text: Gorgeous prints to add style to any baby's wardrobe.  I love the snap feature on these--we've been dealing with Velcro that comes right off with a 1 year old baby pulling and tugging those right off.  This is a perfect gift idea and must have item for any baby.  I was given a set of these and I can't stress how great and perfect the concept of keeping my baby's clothing free of drool.  The only downside is they are too cute to wear during feedings!  I rate these drool bibs a 5.  Thank you for the clever concept of keeping my baby's clothing dry so she can look cute all day!
title: No more tugging on the Velcro bibs!

author: S + H
text: Love these adorable bibs for my 5 month old daughter!  She is an early teether and has been drooling constantly.  I was looking for a more absorbent bib that can be tossed in the washer and dryer without a waterproof plastic liner when I came across this set on Amazon.  I'm so happy I went with this product after reading all of the positive reviews.  The fleece back really does keep my baby dry for several hours.  I do find myself going through 2-3 of these bibs throughout the day because the front of the bib will become soaked.  My daughter is just beginning to eat solids, and based on the other reviews, I use a different bib while she eats and use these solely as drool bibs for when she is awake.  I also like how the bib has button snaps as the velcro bibs tend to stick to other clothing in the dryer.  The bandana bib style works well to provide full coverage under my daughter's chin.  I especially like the stylish prints of these bibs, and just ordered two more sets of Copper Pearl bandana bibs in different prints!
title: Great drool bibs!

author: AppleBologna
text: This is a must have for nursing and in the go moms.  The material is stretchy jersey which allows you to pop your whole head in while nursing if you need to (which I often do as a first time nurser...we are still working on proper latching).  This allows you to completely pull your top up  in publix if necessary without worrying about your back being exposed like with other apron like nursing covers.  We also use this as a cover for our car seat and like how it's not completely taught....the stretchy loose fabric allows us to easily and quickly cover and uncover the baby in the car seat.  I've used this as a spit up wipe as well in a tight pinch and had no problems with it washing right out in a regular load of laundry.  Our daughter loves looking st the black and white stripes!  We haven't yet used this as a grocery seat cover since our little one is only 2.5 weeks old, but we are sure we will love it for that as well.

text: This is the best nursing cover! I love that it is so versatile and can be used so many other ways as well. I have been so frustrated with my other nursing covers, they don't cover enough or the fabric gets in the way of seeing your baby (My baby is only 1 month old and we had a rough start, so latching is still frustrating at times). This one stays put and covers you front and back so that you don't have to worry about people peaking through the sides. It's super soft and stretchy and doesn't feel like it is smothering the baby. Love it.

author: Tiffany
text: I received this cover free of charge in exchange for my unbiased opinion and can I just say I AM IN LOVE. This is the BEST nursing cover that I have come across. I work on a post partum unit and I assist with breastfeeding, and can I just say a good nursing cover is a must. And THIS IS THAT COVER. The fabric is so soft and stretchy and the length of the cover is perfect, it's nice and long. I have seen other brands of this same type of cover and they aren't nearly as long as this cover. I love that the cover wraps around front and back so my back isn't exposed when nursing. COPPER PEARL made the mark and went above and beyond with this cover. I love that it doubles as a nursing cover, car seat cover and shopping  cart cover. I have used it on the shopping cart and have had many people stop me and inquire about the cover. This will be the best purchase you could make as a new mom, or a mom of many. Or it would make a perfect gift. Way to go copper pearl!

text: I've got a couple of other covers like this from other brands and this one definitely takes the cake. Obviously it's super cute and I love how functional it is. I use it primarily for the car seat cover and get compliments every time I go out. The fabric is slightly heavier than the other covers I've purchased, which is great for shading sun and keeping baby warmer. As a nursing cover, it's wonderful as it has a wider body but a narrower neck so I don't ever feel too exposed. This narrow neck also allows it to fit more snug on the car seat. Baby isn't quite big enough to use in a shopping cart, but I can't wait to get to use the cover for that purpose as well.

text: This car seat cover is exactly what I expected it's stylish and functional. I use it as both a car seat cover and nursing cover (so much better than a traditional nursing cover). The company reached out to make sure I was satisfied with my purchase and answered any question I had quickly. Will definetly be purchasing these in the future as gifts for friends!
title: Excellent Customer Service

author: Juan
text: I have seen similar stretchy covers from other brands but they are nothing compared to this Copper Pearl brand. I absolutely love the quality of this product. The fabric is thick and stretchy, but not like a hole is going to pop up any second like other stretchy fabrics I've worked with. I love that they found a medium between not too thin of fabric but it also isn't too hot. No one wants to get extra hot while nursing And this feels breezy when on. I also use it as a car seat cover and love that I don't have fabric flapping around and that I can still dangle a toy from the top handle.
title: Exceeded expectations

author: Alexandra Harrison
text: I love the look of this cover! But it has to come completely off when it is on the car seat to get the baby out which I didn't expect. I thought that there would be a wider opening to stretch around the car seat so that we could cover him up when we need to but leave it open when he is awake. It is a pain to keep putting it on and off. It also seems to get warm in there when I have it on. Today we walked around briefly (maybe 15 minutes) while he slept and when I got him out he was so sweaty! That makes me nervous. I will purchase the Native Wilds cover again for the car seat (we lost our last one) which has a wider opening and never overheated the baby like this.
title: I love the look of this cover

author: Gini
text: I bought your cover up for my daughter. We are planning  a trip to California and I thought that nursing would be more discrete with your product than blankets. My daughters baby is 7 months old and she is at the age where do attractions can make her pull away suddenly while nursing leaving my daughter exposed for all to see. After trying your cover for the first time my daughter commented that she wished she would have had it 7 months ago. She can't wait to get away it as a grocery cart cover as she is always conscious of every germ in the universe.  The washability and stretchiness of the fabric makes it easy to use. Love the stripes. Thank you
title: Grandma gift

author: Amazon Customer
text: I love this cover! Baby is 7 months old but still using the car seat carrier and I love this for covering her during the cold winter months. She already has this little sleeping bag type of liner that we use to keep her warm. I wanted something that would shield her from the wind but not roast her, this is perfect. I considered getting a Milk Snob but couldn't justify the price tag. This sweet little product works exactly how I hoped it would, is cute and stylish, and was in the right price range. If you are on the fence, I say go for it!!

Haven't used it as a shopping cart cover since I use it as a carseat cover and nursing cover ..germs. love the design, I wish there we more designs with darker colors so they don't show when it gets dirty, but I love the black and white stripes. I love all the designs, I just need darker colors. The fabric is great, very stratchy, but it's no problem, but it's nice and light and thin, just as these types of covers should be. It seems as though it would fit any infant carseat. I use it in the car and on the stroller. I have the britax b safe carseat. But I would definitely recommend it, I get compliments on it all the time. If you're questioning it, I say go for it. The only thing that may deter you is if your baby is long, the feet may touch the cover while in the carseat. Hasn't been a real problem for me tho. My 4 month old is around 26 inches. Ok good luck!

author: Sarahdactyl
text: Super soft, stretchy, I have used as a carseat cover and a nursing cover and it performs great in both uses. It is a little hard to get little one latched because the stretch fabric has to be held out for you to see in, so sometimes I just duck my head under and then pull it down once she's on. It's a little annoying but worth it to have *total* coverage even from above. I loved using it to cover her carseat when she was little, too. You can see in through the hole where the handle sticks out. The black and white contrast is good for their little eyes - she seems mesmerized while nursing or riding in her carseat under it, so I'll take it as I know not all babies will tolerate nursing with a cover. I have washed and dried it several times and it's holding up great so far. I will definitely give this as a baby shower gift in the future! Seems to perform just as well as some more expensive, similar brands. I'm excited to use it as a shopping cart cover when she's older!

author: McZack
text: For baby #2, I really did not purchase anything new. However, since 2 years ago, I have seen a ton of moms with car seat canopies, usually ones which attach to the handle of the car seat. author: L. Roberts
text: First impressions only since I haven't taken these both out and about. Pictures show copper pearl on the left and milk snob on the right. These statements are my opinion and I have purchased both products on my own at full price with no promise of reviews. Copper pearl's white stripes are more cream colored, the stitching is black, the inside is the same color as the outside, the full cover is two large pieces stitched together, grey label near bottom on the side. Milk snob has true white stripes, stitching is white and the inside has grey and white stripes, the full cover is one large piece of fabric, black label centered near top. Similarities - similar size, thickness, weight and stretchiness, both fit nice n snug on my britax car seat. Will update after using for awhile.
title: Copper Pearl vs Milk Snob - first impressions

author: Adrienne
text: This is an absolute MUST HAVE for newborns. My baby was born in March, this cover has protected her from all the elements... wind, rain, pollen, noise, sun, and even a bug! It fits on my carrier & stroller, she will fall asleep and stay asleep because she's in this bubble/tent atmosphere. It's soft, stretchy, and so easy to pop on, anytime I go out, this cover is on before my baby leaves the house. It's also a lifesaver if you're a germaphobe like me, when I'm pushing my baby people can't see her so they don't ask to look or touch, and I also feel like it probably keeps a lot of germs away by acting as a barrier. I used it as a nursing once, I wore it like a scarf and just draped it over my chest, though I prefer a blanket as a cover. I haven't used it as a shopping cart seat cover but I'm sure I will.
title: and so easy to pop on

I really like that it fully covers me and my baby, so I don't have to worry about any nip slips in public :) it's a little tricky to use with a newborn that doesn't have full head control. Because it's narrow at the neck, I can't fully see my baby to get him to latch, so I have to kind of pull my head into the cover, get him to latch, and then pull my head out. Once he has better head control and can latch himself easily, it will be easier to use.

author: G. Merritt
text: So much easier to navigate than those covers with the velcro to attach it to the handle. Those get in the way of everything, especially if you have toys on the handle. Plus, they often blow off and negate the purpose of having a cover. Not this one - it stays put and gives you easy access to the handle. I had been throwing a muslin blanket over the seat during the warmer months, but that was such a hassle. This one is so much better. I was going to buy the $40 one that looks similar to this, but this one works great! I haven't used it for nursing because my 8-month-old just doesn't want to be covered. I did put it over a high chair in DQ the other day, and it worked very well to keep my little guy clean and more germ-free!
title: Perfect car seat cover!

Second, the baby LOVES the black and white stripes, added bonus. Finally, I have nursed in public multiple times using this cover and its awesome! You can have it stretch out to completely cover you and have more ease of manuvering with a Nip Slip! I will totally buy this as a shower gift for future friends.

author: sparrowhawk
text: I had a nursing cover with my first two babies that just covered the front, in fact I mostly just used muslin swaddles to cover myself then.  After seeing a tunic style nursing cover on a friend, this time around I realized I wanted one like hers that would cover my whole body so my sides/belly/back wouldn't be exposed when I lifted up my shirt (when not wearing a nursing tank/top).  This one does that.  It's stretchy but gives me the privacy I need and is much more discreet than the nursing covers that only cover the front.  The fabric is nice and lightweight but not at all see through.  I've used it as a car seat cover and really like it for that as well as nursing.  I don't like the car seat canopy covers because being thick minky fabric I think they restrict air flow.  This one I feel good about because it is lightweight and breathable, and you can position the opening so it lets in air if you want, or place the opening further back onto the hood of your car seat if you don't.  It must be a hit because I've seen 2-3 mothers with it around Las Vegas already.  I've washed it a few times and have been letting it air dry to keep it in good shape and avoid piling (which I saw on one of the ones I saw around town).  I bought it mainly for it's use as a nursing cover, the car set cover aspect and cart/high chair cover aspect are bonus for me.  I'm glad I bought it and will recommend it to friends.
title: You can pull your shirt up and no one will see! No more need for nursing tops
